title: 急。。。。。。。
author: mingxi
txt_content:
给个准确的答案吧大家！！！！！我没有没占用文件。。。。。。我把其他的server.jar都删了还是不行


[INFO] Starting minecraft server version 1.4.7
[WARNING] To start the server with more ram, launch it as "java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar"
[INFO] Loading properties
[INFO] Default game type: SURVIVAL
[INFO] Generating keypair
[INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
[WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind
[WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 strawmaine 于 2013-3-8 21:25 编辑 

server.properties里的server-port请留空白
请确认java通过防火墙

请确认没有另外的java进程。

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
mingxi 发表于 2013-3-8 23:27 
不行。。。
内存不够
弄成2g吧

replies.author: mingxi
replies.txt_content:
ylqx1997 发表于 2013-3-8 21:31 
内存不够
弄成2g吧
2G是满？？？？？？

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
mingxi 发表于 2013-3-8 23:36 
2G是满？？？？？？
不是满···你把开服的那个bat文件修改一下

replies.author: mingxi
replies.txt_content: 极啊求求你们了帮帮我

replies.author: mingxi
replies.txt_content:
ylqx1997 发表于 2013-3-8 21:42 
不是满···你把开服的那个bat文件修改一下
开服的那个bat文件是什么？

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
mingxi 发表于 2013-3-8 23:47 
开服的那个bat文件是什么？
你有QQ吗？
回帖略不方便

replies.author: mingxi
replies.txt_content: 没QQ。               我昨天还能玩。。自从把文件复制去别的电脑就进不去了

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
噗···你看下你服务端的文件夹 应该只有一个bat文件
把内容改成"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx2G -jar xxxxxx（你的服务端）.jar
PAUSE

replies.author: mingxi
replies.txt_content: 能发图么？不清楚 是在.minecraft里找到还是minecraft里的什么文件？
